trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design para controles de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" />.
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner> fornece suporte de tempo de design para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> controles.

trans-unit.source: It extends its parent class, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner>, by adding a control-specific <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ele estende sua classe pai, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner>, adicionando um controle específico <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner> does not render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner> não processar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The associated control, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" />, is a <see langword="sealed" /> class and cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: O controle associado, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" />, é um <see langword="sealed" /> de classe e não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, there is little value in deriving from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner" /> because it cannot be overridden to apply to any other control.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, há pouco valor na derivação de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner" /> porque ele não pode ser substituído para aplicar a qualquer outro controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the parent method to prevent rendering of the control.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o método pai para evitar a renderização do controle.

trans-unit.source: Either an empty string ("") or the value of <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") ou o valor de <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml" />.

trans-unit.source: If there is no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart.WebPartsTemplate%2A> associated with the control, the designer displays the standard gray box with the class name and instance name of the control.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart.WebPartsTemplate%2A> associado ao controle, o designer exibe a caixa cinza padrão com o nome de classe e o nome da instância do controle.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, no design-time rendering occurs at all because the check boxes and Web Parts titles are rendered by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> itself.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, nenhum processamento de tempo de design em todos os ocorre porque as caixas de seleção e títulos de Web Parts são renderizados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> em vez do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> em si.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup to represent an empty control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação para representar um controle na superfície de design.
Uma cadeia de caracteres de marcação vazia.

trans-unit.source: This operation renders the control as a gray box showing the class name and the instance name.
trans-unit.target: Esta operação renderiza o controle como uma caixa cinza que indica o nome da classe e o nome da instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" /> control associated with the designer.

Binds the designer to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" /> control and sets the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.TemplateEditing" /> view flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Associa o designer ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart" /> associado e define o sinalizador de exibição <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewFlags.TemplateEditing" /> para <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de grupos de modelos, cada uma contendo uma ou mais definições de modelo.

trans-unit.source: The appended <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> associated with this class.
trans-unit.target: O acrescentados <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> associados a essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property overrides its base implementation to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> object that is specific to this class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> propriedade substitui a sua implementação base para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objeto que é específico para essa classe.
